content: In the pandemic year that we reported, I guess, a quarter ago, the full year, we made it clear that our focus then was on cash conservation and shoring up our balance sheet and making sure we could get to what we knew was going to be an extremely difficult period as strong as we possibly could and I think that was the right strategy, and we did do well in terms of preserving cash, in fact, we almost tripled our cash balance between the start of the year, the end of the year.
